title: Tomato cucumber salad with mint
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 large cucumbers, thinly sliced', '3 large tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '1 medium red onion, chopped', 'handful chopped fresh mint', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
